biotools.summary:
Rice Genome Reannotation Using Massive RNA-seq Data.

Rice Genome Reannotation Project.

IC4R Information Commons for Rice.

Information Commons for Rice (IC4R) is a curated database providing rice genome sequences, updating rice gene annotations and integrating multiple omics data through community-contributed modules.
